hero.description: Fast, reliable, and professional healthcare at home. English-speaking nurses available 24/7 in Prague.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How do I book a nurse?
q1.answer: You can book through our online system, WhatsApp (+420 773 629 123), or by phone. We typically respond within minutes and can arrange same-day visits.

q2.question: Are your nurses qualified?
q2.answer: Yes, all our nurses are fully licensed healthcare professionals with proper qualifications and years of experience in clinical and home healthcare settings.

q3.question: Do you speak English?
q3.answer: Yes! All our nurses are fluent in English to ensure clear communication with international patients. We also speak Czech, Russian, and Ukrainian.

q4.question: What areas do you cover?
q4.answer: We serve all of Prague and surrounding areas within approximately 20km radius. Contact us to confirm if we serve your specific location.

q5.question: How do I pay?
q5.answer: We accept cash, bank transfer, and card payments. Payment is made after the service is completed to your satisfaction.

q6.question: Can I book for the same day?
q6.answer: Yes! We offer same-day service based on availability. Our typical response time is 2-4 hours from booking confirmation.
